data.title: Next-Generation Firewall Market Set for Explosive Growth with Cisco Systems, SonicWall, McAfee

data.text:
Next-Generation Firewall Market

The latest study released on the Global Next-Generation Firewall Market by HTF MI evaluates market size, trend, and forecast to 2030. The Next-Generation Firewall market study covers significant research data and proofs to be a handy resource document for managers, analysts, industry experts and other key people to have ready-to-access and self-analyzed study to help understand market trends, growth drivers, opportunities and upcoming challenges and about the competitors.

Key Players in This Report Include: Palo Alto Networks (United States), Cisco Systems (United States), Fortinet (United States), Check Point Software Technologies (Israel), Sophos (United Kingdom), Juniper Networks (United States), Barracuda Networks (United States), SonicWall (United States), Forcepoint (United States), McAfee (United States)

According to HTF Market Intelligence, the global Next-Generation Firewall Market is expected to register a CAGR of 11.1% during the forecast period.

Get inside Scoop of Next-Generation Firewall Market: https://www.htfmarketintelligence.com/sample-report/global-next-generation-firewall-market?utm_source=Krati_OpenPR&utm_id=Krati

Definition:

A Next-Generation Firewall (NGFW) is an advanced network security device designed to provide comprehensive protection against a wide range of threats by integrating multiple security features into a single platform.

Market Drivers:

Increasing sophistication and volume of cyber threats

Growing adoption of cloud computing and remote work

Advancements in firewall technologies and threat intelligence

Market Opportunities:

Expansion into small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and new industries

Development of integrated solutions with advanced threat detection and response

Have Any Query? Ask Our Expert @: https://www.htfmarketintelligence.com/enquiry-before-buy/global-next-generation-firewall-market?utm_source=Krati_OpenPR&utm_id=Krati

The Global Next-Generation Firewall Market segments and Market Data Break Down are illuminated below:

Next-Generation Firewall Market is Segmented by Component (Hardware, Software, Services) by Organization Size (Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs), Large Enterprises) by Deployment Mode (On-premises, Cloud-based) by End-User Industry (BFSI (Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance), IT and Telecommunications, Healthcare, Government and Public Utilities, Retail, Others) and by Geography (North America, South America, Europe, Asia Pacific, MEA)

Global Next-Generation Firewall market report highlights information regarding the current and future industry trends, growth patterns, as well as it offers business strategies to helps the stakeholders in making sound decisions that may help to ensure the profit trajectory over the forecast years.

Geographically, the detailed analysis of consumption, revenue, market share, and growth rate of the following regions:

• The Middle East and Africa (South Africa, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Israel, Egypt, etc.)

• North America (United States, Mexico & Canada)

• South America (Brazil, Venezuela, Argentina, Ecuador, Peru, Colombia, etc.)

• Europe (Turkey, Spain, Turkey, Netherlands Denmark, Belgium, Switzerland, Germany, Russia UK, Italy, France, etc.)

• Asia-Pacific (Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Vietnam, China, Malaysia, Japan, Philippines, Korea, Thailand, India, Indonesia, and Australia).

Objectives of the Report

• -To carefully analyze and forecast the size of the Next-Generation Firewall market by value and volume.

• -To estimate the market shares of major segments of the Next-Generation Firewall

• -To showcase the development of the Next-Generation Firewall market in different parts of the world.

• -To analyze and study micro-markets in terms of their contributions to the Next-Generation Firewall market, their prospects, and individual growth trends.

• -To offer precise and useful details about factors affecting the growth of the Next-Generation Firewall

• -To provide a meticulous assessment of crucial business strategies used by leading companies operating in the Next-Generation Firewall market, which include research and development, collaborations, agreements, partnerships, acquisitions, mergers, new developments, and product launches.
